item.title: Improving Your Productivity With Visual Studio Code Snippets
item.author: ingjorgegomez@outlook.com (Jorge Gomez)
item.description: Hey everyone, this is my very first article so I hope that you like it. Okay, so let’s move on to the importance of using Snippets, I will do this by showing some examples and how can we improve both our coding speed and productivity. Imagine the next situation: You are writing an API and you have to repeat a lot of code every time you return a response, the response can be either a success or an error.
